translation.en: [woman] In March of 1983,
a massive pulse of interstellar cosmic rays struck the earth and its population.

translation.en: Sometimes I can't picture certain people doing certain things.
translation.ja: 思いがけないことを 誰もがしてるものよ

translation.en: Know what I mean? Like Obama vacuuming or Eleanor Roosevelt flossing--
translation.ja: 例えば オバマが掃除機をかけたり…

translation.en: -Em, are you okay? -What happened?
translation.ja: エミリー　大丈夫？

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.ja: エミリー

translation.en: Frank, stay down.
translation.ja: そこにいて

translation.en: Stay down.
translation.ja: 立たないで

translation.en: I thought The King wanted to talk things through.
translation.ja: ザ･キングも一緒かい？

translation.en: I've been let off the leash.
translation.ja: 彼が私を放した

translation.en: You need to work on your phrasing, because in that scenario, you just made yourself the dog.
translation.ja: その言い回しはやめるべきね 彼の犬みたいだ

translation.en: I'm surprised you ding-dongs lived through the first blast.
translation.ja: 今の爆発で死んだかと思った

translation.en: -You're stronger than I thought. -Maybe you're weaker than you thought.
translation.ja: 思ったより強いのね あんたは結構 弱い

translation.en: I'm…
translation.ja: 黙れ！

translation.en: not…
translation.ja: 私は―

translation.en: weak!
translation.ja: 弱くない！

translation.en: Did she call us ding-dongs?
translation.ja: 彼女 ふざけてる

translation.en: Get a shovel. I'm gonna bury that bitch.
translation.ja: 私たちを甘く見てるね

translation.en: -No! We just fixed that door! -Frank, be qui--
translation.ja: 修理したばかりなのに

translation.en: [Frank] Please, no…
translation.ja: 頼む　助けてくれ！

translation.en: I could hit harder, but I don't wanna kill you, but you will stop hurting my friends!
translation.ja: 手加減してやったのに 私の仲間を苦しめやがって

translation.en: Bye-bye, nerds.
translation.ja: じゃあね

translation.en: Wack job.
translation.ja: イカれてる

translation.en: Stop! Everyone off the bus now!
translation.ja: 全員 バスから降りて

translation.en: Stay here, Frank. Lydi!
translation.ja: 待ってて　リディア！

translation.en: What the hell happened?
translation.ja: 何があったの？

translation.en: Thunder Force needs this.
translation.ja: サンダーフォースよ

translation.en: Lydia, no. Do not throw that bus.
translation.ja: ダメよ バスを投げないで

translation.en: -Lydia! -I got it! No, they're too far away! Do not!
translation.ja: リディア　相手が遠すぎるわ

translation.en: I can't hear you because I'm literally throwing a bus!
translation.ja: 何も聞こえないよ 投げる直前だもの

translation.en: Dads, that lady just threw a bus.
translation.ja: パパ　バスを投げちゃった

translation.en: My god, I just threw a bus.
translation.ja: 本当に投げた

translation.en: Of course, you did. You don't think before you act.
translation.ja: あなたらしい 危険を考えず すぐ行動する

translation.en: You always do the stupid thing.
translation.ja: 危険を考えず すぐ行動する

translation.en: You could've hurt someone. You know how dangerous that was?
translation.ja: 誰かがケガしたら どうする気？

translation.en: I'm sorry. I messed up. I was trying to stop her.
translation.ja: ごめんね レーザーを止めたくて

translation.en: Dang it. You always get carried away. Ever since we were kids.
translation.ja: あなたは昔から やりすぎちゃうの

translation.en: You understand this isn't a game? We have a job to do.
translation.ja: 遊びじゃなくて仕事なのよ

translation.en: I have dedicated my life to stopping Miscreants and here you are acting like one.
translation.ja: 奴らを制止すべきなのに あなた自身が暴れてる

translation.en: I didn't see you trying anything to stop her except disappearing,
translation.ja: レーザーが現れても あんたは姿を消すだけ

translation.en: which, by the way, you've been doing since before you got your power.
translation.ja: レーザーが現れても あんたは姿を消すだけ それが あんたの得意技

translation.en: You know what? I should have both powers because I'd know how to use them.
translation.ja: 私が両方の力を 持つべきだった

translation.en: Whatever you say. You're always right. You're the special one, not me. Right, Em?
translation.ja: あんたは常に正しいよ それに特別な人間だしね

translation.en: Crap doodles!
translation.ja: なんてこと？

translation.en: [reporter] In their attempt to stop Laser,
translation.ja: バスと噴水が破壊されました

translation.en: Thunder Force destroyed a bus and Buckingham Fountain,
translation.ja: バスと噴水が破壊されました サンダーフォースは 迷惑な存在？

translation.en: raising the question, are we better off with Thunder Force?
translation.ja: サンダーフォースは 迷惑な存在？

translation.en: -[Emily] Trace? -We'll have more as the story--
translation.ja: トレイシー

translation.en: [Emily] Hey.
translation.ja: トレイシー

translation.en: -What are you reading? -Oh.
translation.ja: それは？

translation.en: Molecular Thermodynamics of Complex Systems.
translation.ja: 「複雑系の分子熱力学」

translation.en: Oh, I love that one.
translation.ja: 私も大好きな本よ あとで貸して

translation.en: -Can I read it after you finish? -Sure.
translation.ja: 私も大好きな本よ あとで貸して ええ

translation.en: Are you okay, Mom?
translation.ja: 大丈夫？

translation.en: I'm, uh… I'm okay, honey.
translation.ja: ええ　何とかね

translation.en: Just… working through some stuff with Lydia.
translation.ja: リディアと少しもめてるけど

translation.en: I know. She called me.
translation.ja: 彼女から電話で聞いた

translation.en: Of course, she did.
translation.ja: だと思ったわ 気が合うみたいね

translation.en: -You guys get along okay, huh? -I like her.
translation.ja: だと思ったわ 気が合うみたいね 彼女が好きよ

translation.en: She's weird and she's funny and we talk about a lot of stuff.
translation.ja: 面白い性格だし いろいろ話せる

translation.en: You think I don't talk to you enough?
translation.ja: 私とは話せない？

translation.en: Am I too tough on you?
translation.ja: 厳しすぎる？

translation.en: I've just… I've always wanted to make it so other people, so you…
translation.ja: あなたには私のような思いを させたくなくて

translation.en: -didn't have to grow up the way I did. -Afraid?
translation.ja: 努力してきたの つらい幼少期ね

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: I'm so sorry, honey.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい

translation.en: [Emily] I miss my mom and dad every day,
translation.ja: 今も あの２人が恋しい

translation.en: but I've been so consumed with righting a wrong that I've…
translation.ja: 不正を正すことに夢中で―

translation.en: oh, I've missed out on so much of our time together.
translation.ja: あなたと あまり過ごせなかった

translation.en: I'm gonna change that.
translation.ja: 反省してる

translation.en: You do great. You're too hard on yourself,
translation.ja: 母さんは頑張ってるわ 自分を責めないで

translation.en: and Lydia too. She's been your friend for a long time. Even when you didn't want her to be.
translation.ja: リディアのこともよ 昔からの大切な親友でしょ

translation.en: She's always been a bit of a hurricane.
translation.ja: 向こう見ずな人だから

translation.en: -She's a good person. -I know she is.
translation.ja: いい人よ でもバスを投げた

translation.en: But she threw a bus.
translation.ja: でもバスを投げた

translation.en: Yeah, but in her defense, she was trying to stop the bad guys, right?
translation.ja: そうだけど 悪党を止めるためでしょ？

translation.en: -She was. -Also, she really wanted to throw a bus.
translation.ja: ええ すごく投げたかったみたい

translation.en: You're too much.
translation.ja: 面白い子ね

translation.en: Oh, I'm so proud of you.
translation.ja: 誇りに思うわ

translation.en: -Did she say where she was going? -On a date.
translation.ja: 何してるって？ デート

translation.en: That's Lydia for you. Always finding time to have fun.
translation.ja: リディアらしいわ 毎日を楽しんでる

translation.en: [The Crab] Swimming is what I try to focus on.
translation.ja: 今は水泳を頑張ってる

translation.en: -[Lydia] Is it? -Yeah. [Lydia] You got the shoulders for it.
translation.ja: そう　確かに肩が強そう

translation.en: I am very surprised that you reached out to me.
translation.ja: 君から連絡が来るとは 思わなかったよ

translation.en: Especially since I thought that you might be dead.
translation.ja: もう死んでるだろうと

translation.en: It wasn't for lack of trying, right?
translation.ja: 何とか生き延びた

translation.en: That psycho Laser really put her back into trying to kill us.
translation.ja: レーザーの執着心には 参ったけど

translation.en: It was a surprise you made it out alive.
translation.ja: まるで奇跡だな

translation.en: Lot of people don't live to tell the tale.
translation.ja: 彼女に狙われた者は ほぼ全員 死ぬ

translation.en: She just-- She loves killing people.
translation.ja: 彼女に狙われた者は ほぼ全員 死ぬ 殺しが本当に好きなのさ

translation.en: Just loves it. So boring.
translation.ja: 殺しが本当に好きなのさ

translation.en: I guess I got lucky. I'm built like a Sherman tank.
translation.ja: ごいつ体刑でよかった

translation.en: -Mmm. -The suits are very resilient. I mean, they do not smell good.
translation.ja: あのスーツも頑丈だよ 臭いけどね

translation.en: Wow, they don't smell good. But very resilient.
translation.ja: すごく臭いけど とにかく頑丈

translation.en: You smell good to me.
translation.ja: 君の香りは好きだ

translation.en: Yeah. Which, you know, is surprising,
translation.ja: 君の香りは好きだ 実は たいぶ 嗅覚が弱くなってる

translation.en: 'cause I don't have a sense of smell that good,
translation.ja: 実は たいぶ 嗅覚が弱くなってる

translation.en: ever since the, you know-- Since the accident.
translation.ja: ある事故に遭ってから

translation.en: If it's not too… too much, too soon, what happened?
translation.ja: 何があったのか 聞いてもいい？

translation.en: Oh, well, I was on my honeymoon in Bermuda,
translation.ja: 新婚旅行で バミューダに行った そこで 当時の妻に誘われて―

translation.en: and my then-wife,
translation.ja: そこで 当時の妻に誘われて―

translation.en: she says, "Jer, how about we go skinny-dip snorkeling?"
translation.ja: スノーケリングを やることになった

translation.en: And, uh, I say, "That sounds fun. Let's go buns up."
translation.ja: スノーケリングを やることになった 楽しそうだと思ってね

translation.en: We took off our clothes, jumped in the water,
translation.ja: 服を脱いで海に入ったが

translation.en: and what we didn't know is we were over a radioactive coral reef.
translation.ja: 海底には放射性珊瑚礁(さんごしょう )が 広がっていた

translation.en: Is that right?
translation.ja: そうなの？

translation.en: And up jumps a radioactive crab, bites me in the genitals.
translation.ja: 放射性カニが現れて 俺の性器を攻撃

translation.en: Oh, man.
translation.ja: 大変ね

translation.en: Rest is history.
translation.ja: それでこうなって 妻とも…

translation.en: -She immediately left me. -Her loss.
translation.ja: それでこうなって 妻とも… 離婚？

translation.en: Anyway, I went into a life of crime.

translation.en: I don't know, it brings up some kinda questions.

translation.en: You tell me that story. Are you-- I mean, are you fully a Miscreant or…

translation.en: Not crazy about labels. -But I do get that a lot. -Yeah.

translation.en: What I usually-- I say I'm a Half-creant.

translation.en: -Half-Korean. -Half-creant.

translation.en: I thought you said half-Korean.

translation.en: You're not the first one to-- Yeah, but no.

translation.en: Either one would be wildly interesting, but Half-creant… I like that.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: I thought we had a real nice connection there at the liquor store.

translation.en: You know, I don't know if it's… because I got a lot of family up and down the East Coast or…

translation.en: Oh, yeah? Maybe it's the smell of Old Bay has always kind of…

translation.en: just done something to me. Kind of made me warm and fuzzy.
translation.ja: シーフードの 調味料も好きだし

translation.en: It's a great smell.
translation.ja: 俺も好きだ

translation.en: I look at you and I just think somewhere inside those kind of yoked, strong…

translation.en: glistening shells, is the heart of a really good man-crab.
translation.ja: 優しくて男らしい心を 隠し持っていそうな気がする

translation.en: How about a toast, huh? To me, right?
translation.ja: 乾杯しよう　俺に？

translation.en: -To you. -Come here.
translation.ja: ええ よし

translation.en: -It's-- -Hang on one sec.
translation.ja: 少し待ってくれよ

translation.en: -Can I get you a little-- -No, I'm not a child.
translation.ja: 手伝う？ いいや　平気だ

translation.en: Sometimes I do need to drink it like it's cocoa.

translation.en: -Yep. Me too. -They're super powerful. But let's try it.
translation.ja: 超強力なハサミだから 慎重にな

translation.en: Cheers to me, huh?
translation.ja: 俺に乾杯しよう

translation.en: Son of a bitch! [loudly] God damn it!
translation.ja: マジかよ　チクショウ！

translation.en: Oh, don't be rude. Eat your dinner. Thank you.
translation.ja: 見せ物じゃないぞ　食事しろ

translation.en: [Lydia] Show's over.
translation.ja: 見ないで

translation.en: I keep thinking I've got a handle on it. I should stick with shot glasses and things get easier for me.
translation.ja: やっぱりショットグラスに すべきだったよ

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thanks for that.
translation.ja: どうも ありがとう

translation.en: You got a… a weak glass there.
translation.ja: ここのグラスは弱いな

translation.en: Hey, there. Thank you, Carl. We'll clean that right up.
translation.ja: すぐに片づけるので 気にせずに

translation.en: Happens all the time. Any decisions on food?
translation.ja: 注文は決まりました？

translation.en: -Well-- -If you're looking for suggestions,
translation.ja: えっと… ２人で仲よく食べるなら “海鮮塔”がお薦めです

translation.en: my favorite appetizer to share, personally, is the petite seafood tower.
translation.ja: ２人で仲よく食べるなら “海鮮塔”がお薦めです

translation.en: It has everything.
translation.ja: 豪勢ですよ

translation.en: Has crab claws, Dungeness crab, snow crab, tiger prawns--
translation.ja: カニバサミにズワイガニ ブラックタイガー

translation.en: I didn't know we were getting food and entertainment.
translation.ja: 娯楽的メニューって感じか？

translation.en: -It is fun! -Jimmy Jokes.
translation.ja: ええ　楽しめます

translation.en: Hey, are you pitching the tower, the seafood tower to a half-crab?
translation.ja: 本気で そんなメニューを 俺に薦めるのか？

translation.en: -Jesus. -Recommending that to me, huh? [laughs]
translation.ja: マズい 海鮮塔だってよ

translation.en: -That takes a lot of stones. -What is this, the cannibal table?
translation.ja: すげえ根性だ 共食いの席？

translation.en: You gonna offer me a 32-year-old woman named Lydia?
translation.ja: 私には32歳の女を 食べさせる気だね

translation.en: Because I'm 32.
translation.ja: 私が32歳だから

translation.en: I believe it and I won't offer you that. I'll be sensible next time.
translation.ja: 疑ってません 今後は注意します

translation.en: Connect with your guests better.
translation.ja: 客を大事にしろ

translation.en: I am so sorry, sir. I didn't see your pincers.
translation.ja: ハサミが見えなくて失礼を

translation.en: [The Crab] I apologize for raising my voice,
translation.ja: 俺も大声を出して悪かったよ

translation.en: but I got bit on the ball bag by a radioactive crab,
translation.ja: 俺も大声を出して悪かったよ カニに陰嚢(いんのう)をやられたし 甲殻類が大好物だったから

translation.en: and I used to love shellfish.
translation.ja: カニに陰嚢(いんのう)をやられたし 甲殻類が大好物だったから

translation.en: So, my fuse is a little short. This is a trigger environment for me.
translation.ja: カニに陰嚢(いんのう)をやられたし 甲殻類が大好物だったから つい感情的になってしまった

translation.en: -I understand. -Okay.
translation.ja: なるほど

translation.en: I'm gonna need a minute. Why don't you take off?
translation.ja: 少し時間が要るから外して

translation.en: No problem.
translation.ja: もちろん

translation.en: -They're just jealous. -'Cause of who I'm sitting with maybe.
translation.ja: 嫉妬よ 君が美人だからさ

translation.en: Anything on that menu look good?
translation.ja: 何が食べたい？

translation.en: I was thinking about chicken, but I was afraid you might be half-chicken.
translation.ja: 鶏肉にしたいけど カニ以外は問題なし？

translation.en: Ha. No, no. Just crab and man.
translation.ja: 心配無用だ 俺はカニとペニスだけで 構成されてる

translation.en: A lot of man. I was gonna order the chicken too,
translation.ja: 俺はカニとペニスだけで 構成されてる 鶏肉もいいが―

translation.en: but unfortunately, I like my chicken the way you get it in the crab traps, -and that's raw. -[gasps]
translation.ja: カニ取りの餌になるような 生が一番 好きだ

translation.en: -What happened? -I just got…
translation.ja: 何だ？ 実は私も…

translation.en: Do you like raw chicken, too?
translation.ja: 生の鶏肉が好き？

translation.en: Ever since… kind of what I've gone through,
translation.ja: 体が変化してから―

translation.en: physically, I've had a kind of insatiable… craving for raw chicken myself.
translation.ja: 生の鶏肉に対しての欲望が 常に私を悩ませてる

translation.en: Come here.
translation.ja: 握って

translation.en: So, you tracked me down, you know? What do you wanna know?
translation.ja: 君は俺を追い詰めたぞ 何が知りたい？

translation.en: I just need to know whose side you're on.
translation.ja: 誰の味方なのか

translation.en: What are you doin'?
translation.ja: 何してる？

translation.en: I'm just butterin' your knuckle.
translation.ja: バターでベトベトに

translation.en: I know things are weird between us because we had harsh words.
translation.ja: この前の口論以来 ギクシャクしてる

translation.en: Yes, because I threw the city bus even though you said, "Do not."
translation.ja: この前の口論以来 ギクシャクしてる 投げるなと言われたのに 投げてしまい―

translation.en: And it didn't make it any better than whatever the city bus thing did.
translation.ja: 投げるなと言われたのに 投げてしまい― 街を破壊して 高額な修理代が発生した

translation.en: It's gonna cost a million dollars and I wish I'd stop talking.
translation.ja: 街を破壊して 高額な修理代が発生した 話が止まらないよ 緊張のせいかな？

translation.en: I'm like, worse than Tom in accounting who's like, "My ledger."
translation.ja: 話が止まらないよ 緊張のせいかな？ “台帳だと…”が口癖の トムよりウザい

translation.en: He always smells like old lady liniment or like an old lady chafing
translation.ja: “台帳だと…”が口癖の トムよりウザい 彼は湿布薬臭くて イヤな奴だけど―

translation.en: and now I'm almost worse than Tom, if that's possible.
translation.ja: 彼は湿布薬臭くて イヤな奴だけど― 今の私は彼より最低

translation.en: -Tom, I'm gonna have to call you back. -[Tom] No problem.
translation.ja: トム　あとでかけ直すわ

translation.en: Tom, just ki-- Gotcha! April Fools.
translation.ja: トム　エイプリルフールよ

translation.en: -Just not in April. [laughs] Is he gone? -He's gone.
translation.ja: ４月じゃないけど 切った？ ええ

translation.en: It's, uh, so much more money than a million bucks.
translation.ja: 修理代は100万ドル以上よ

translation.en: -More? -It's okay. I'm gonna cover it.
translation.ja: マジ？ 私が払うから大丈夫

translation.en: And no one was hurt. Somehow.
translation.ja: ケガ人がいなくて何より

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: I heard you were on a date.
translation.ja: デートしたそうね

translation.en: It was really more of a fact-finding mission. I… I found out what The King is up to.
translation.ja: デートというより調査よ ザ･キングの計画が判明した

translation.en: And that little party he's throwing, it's just like a group funeral.
translation.ja: 彼のパーティーは 集団葬儀も同然になる

translation.en: He's gonna take those people that didn't vote for him, put 'em in a building, blow it to smithereens.
translation.ja: 票を入れなかった人々を 集めて 爆弾で殺す気よ

translation.en: -How did you get this information? -Hmm?
translation.ja: 情報源は？

translation.en: Who told you?
translation.ja: 誰なの？

translation.en: The King's lost it since the election. I'm gonna get out of the game.
translation.ja: ザ･キングはイカれてる 足を洗いたい

translation.en: [spluttering] Who-- Who told you? What?
translation.ja: 誰から聞いたかって？

translation.en: What happened to your buttons?
translation.ja: ボタンがないわよ

translation.en: Ooh, that's a great start. Yep. Ooh.
translation.ja: いい感じだ

translation.en: The Crab?
translation.ja: クラブ？

translation.en: You're saying it negatively.
translation.ja: 批判する気？

translation.en: There's something about him. Somewhere in there, he's a good guy.

translation.en: which is probably the cooler power,

translation.en: even before I said it wasn't, but it kind of is.

translation.en: Oh, Lydi…

translation.en: Sometimes I don't know if I'm mad at you because you always go crazy

translation.en: or if I'm really just mad at myself because… I never do.

translation.en: Well, we can't both be nuts.

translation.en: Let's just figure out how we can stop The King.

translation.en: I know you can do anything you put that big brain to.

translation.en: Lydi…

translation.en: Even though I was dumb enough to let us drift apart,

translation.en: you've always been special.

translation.en: Thanks, Em.

translation.en: and meet her in the tech room. Immediately.

translation.en: Terrible!

translation.en: This is set to extra-crispy, you donut hole.

translation.en: No problem.

translation.en: Lydi…
